definition.text: Find the Plugin Trading Systems node and expand it! Note the Plugin File node named Masters-Lightning-Strike...

paragraphs.text: Lightning Strike is the demo Trading System you've been playing with during the Welcome tutorial. It has been placed as a plugin in this workspace!
Follow the orange dotted line downwards until you find the node it connects to! Use the keyboard trick Ctrl + arrows to go faster!
That's it! You found the Lightning Strike Trading System node. If you drag it to the side, you will find the Plugin File Position node below.
